## unproject variable

Reverse operation of [project](./matrices.project.md)<!-- -->. If `invert` is true (default: false), both `mvp` and `view` matrices will be inverted first (non-destructively), else they're both assumed to be inverted already.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unproject: (out: Vec, mvp: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, view: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, p: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, doInvert?: boolean) => Vec | undefined
```
